Hi all,
 
As is common knowledge, Heritrix's aggressive link extraction met=
hods lead
to a large number of 404 errors. Generally we've simple accepted =
this and
believed it to be of fairly little consequnce.
 
However, this mor=
ning I got an e-mail from an irate webmaster complaining
about this behavio=
r. It seems that he gets an e-mail for every 404 error
that occurs. He expl=
ained that this was due to a recent restructuring of the
web, they were kee=
ping an eye out for stray dead links that might still
exist. Heritrix swamp=
ed his Inbox with 18.000 e-mails over the course a few
days.
 
I'm not sure=
 that there is anything we can do about this, but I thought I
would share t=
his here.
 
- Kris
